tasks.label: Build wc.so
args: cd src/mrapps && GO111MODULE=off go build -buildmode=plugin -o wc.so wc.go

tasks.label: Build indexer.so
args: cd src/mrapps && GO111MODULE=off go build -buildmode=plugin -o indexer.so indexer.go

tasks.label: Build all plugins
args: cd src/mrapps && GO111MODULE=off go build -buildmode=plugin -o wc.so wc.go && GO111MODULE=off go build -buildmode=plugin -o indexer.so indexer.go
tasks.detail: Build both wc and indexer plugins

tasks.label: Build Master
args: cd src/main && GO111MODULE=off go build -o mrmaster mrmaster.go

tasks.label: Build Worker
args: cd src/main && GO111MODULE=off go build -o mrworker mrworker.go

tasks.label: Build Sequential
args: cd src/main && GO111MODULE=off go build -o mrsequential mrsequential.go

tasks.label: Build All Lab1
args: cd src/main && GO111MODULE=off go build -o mrmaster mrmaster.go && GO111MODULE=off go build -o mrworker mrworker.go && GO111MODULE=off go build -o mrsequential mrsequential.go && cd ../mrapps && GO111MODULE=off go build -buildmode=plugin -o wc.so wc.go && GO111MODULE=off go build -buildmode=plugin -o indexer.so indexer.go
